::Spears::

She hopped sideways and dodged two shots.  One caught her in the 
side.  She screamed in pain, mech fluid running down her side.  She 
turned and fired 4 more quills at Serpentor. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> Serpentor jumped to his feet, sidestepping, a quill digging into 
his side.  
> Raising his laser rifle, he fired off three plasma bolts at Spears.
